definitions.text: accept as true; take to be true
examples: We didn't believe his stories from the War

definitions.text: judge or regard; look upon; judge
examples: I think he is very smart
I believe her to be very smart
I think that he is her boyfriend
The racist conceives such people to be inferior
I believe that he will come back from the war

definitions.text: follow a credo; have a faith; be a believer
examples: When you hear his sermons, you will be able to believe, too
Should we believe a publication like the National Enquirer?
